name: Rayquaza ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Frenzy
poke_body.effect: As long as your opponent has Kyogre, Kyogre ex, Groudon, or Groudon ex in play, Rayquaza ex’s attacks do 40 damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dragon Bind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
